mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BS_USER(USERNO, USERTYPE, USERID, USERPWD, USERADDR, USEREMAIL, USERPHONE, USERNICK, USERORIGINALFILE, USERSAVEDFILE) VALUES (BS_USERSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userType}, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userAddr}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userNick}, #{userOriginalFile}, #{userSavedFile})
mapper.update: UPDATE BS_USER SET USERPWD = #{userPwd}, USERADDR = #{userAddr}, USEREMAIL = #{userEmail}, USERPHONE = #{userPhone}, USERNICK = #{userNick}, USERORIGINALFILE = #{userOriginalFile}, USERSAVEDFILE = #{userSavedFile} WHERE USERNO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BABYNO, USERNO, BABYGENDER, TO_CHAR(BABYBIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BABYBIRTH, BABYNAME, BABYBLOOD FROM BS_BABY WHERE USERNO=#{userNo} ORDER BY BABYBIRTH ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BS_BABY(BABYNO,USERNO, BABYGENDER, BABYBIRTH, BABYNAME, BABYBLOOD) VALUES (BS_BABYSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{babyGender}, TO_DATE(#{babyBirth},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{babyName}, #{babyBlood})
